In addition to his passion for independent media, Mike is also fascinated by art and design, politics and international relations. He maintains a blog at mhudack.com.

Mike has spoken at the National Association of Television Production Executives, SXSW, Streaming Media West, the Open Media Developers Summit, TelcoTV and dozens of other conferences around the world.
